title: Perfectly Balanced Food!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>It’s ready! Please taste it, You!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Munch... Mmm, this is great! Delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>That’s a relief! It’s all thanks to your detailed instructions.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Nom, nom... But why did you suddenly want to learn how to make Youkisoba?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>The truth is... Recently, Honoka has only been eating bread... I’ve been telling her to have a balanced diet with vegetables and protein, but she hasn’t been listening... She loves Youkisoba, so I know she’ll eat this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oh, I see~ I’m glad you chose to make Youkisoba. Hey, hey, let’s write “UMI” instead of “YO” with the ketchup!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh? Is that alright? I thought those letters are what make it Youkisoba...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Since I’m here, I’ll allow it! It’ll be Umisoba! I’m sure Honoka-chan will be even happier that way~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you! I’ll do it then...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Your writing looks great! Let’s find Honoka-chan and have her eat it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
